Pilot Not Flying: Position center tank fuel pump switches OFF when both pump LOW PRESSURE lights illuminate.

Pilot Flying: Check and set VREF and approach speeds as required.
Pilot Not Flying: Check and set VREF and approach speeds as required.
Verify pressurization set for destination airport elevation and system operating normally.

Pilot Flying: Set AUTO BRAKE select switch to desired brake setting.
Pilot Not Flying: Set AUTO BRAKE select switch to desired brake setting.

Pilot Flying: Set and crosscheck altimeters at transition level.
Pilot Not Flying: Set and crosscheck altimeters at transition level.

Pilot Flying: Set and crosscheck course selection and RADIO/BARO minimums as required for approach.
Pilot Not Flying: Set and crosscheck course selection and RADIO/BARO minimums as required for approach.

Pilot Flying: Set and verify ADF and VHF NAV radios for approach.
Pilot Not Flying: Set and verify ADF and VHF NAV radios for approach
Position fixed landing lights ON passing through 10,000 feet.

Pilot Flying: Call “FLAPS __” according to flap speed schedule.
Pilot Not Flying:
Position FLAP lever as directed and monitor flap and slat extension.
Accomplish standard callouts.

Pilot Flying: Approaching selected FMC altitude verify level off and mode annunciation.
Pilot Not Flying: Approaching selected FMC altitude verify level off and mode annunciation.
